attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From 2003 to the present time more than 200,000 people have been killed in the Darfur conflict. The crimes are tremendous, ranging from mass rapes to mass executions.

At this time it exists two independent tribunals that prosecute Yugoslavian og Rwandanese war criminals respectivly.

We have to show the world that these crimes against humanity commited by the Janjaweed will be punished.

An international tribunal against the war criminals of the Darfur conflict ought to take place.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
